Share: Digg Facebook StumbleUpon Crop Circles On Rings and Three Mysterious Aerial Lights in Slovenia © 2007 by Linda Moulton Howe L jutomer, Slovenia, is not far from the circular, 320-foot-diameter (100 meters) crop formation reported on June 2, 2007, in Ptuj, Slovenia. June 18, 2007 Ljutomer, Slovenia - On Wednesday, June 13, 2007, a crop formation of 18 larger circles "strung on" three rings, plus a very small 19th circle on a small fourth ring orbiting one of the larger circles, appeared near Krapje at Ljutomer, Slovenia, about 984 feet (300 meters) from where a crop pattern appeared in 2006. The 2006 formation had six circles on a ring surrounding a large central circle. 2 006 crop formation reported in Ljutomer, Slovenia, only 300 meters from where the June 13, 2007, latest formation is reported. June 13, 2007 - 19 Circles On 4 Rings, Krapje Near Ljutomer, Slovenia Angelina Premdehar reported to Cropcircleconnector.com: "The formation was discovered on 13th of June. It is impossible to see it from the road. It has 77 meters in diameter. On 14th of June three UFOs were observed and photographed over the site."

S panning 253 feet (77 meters), nineteen circles "strung on" four rings in a Krapje, Slovenia, crop field near Ljutomer, reported June 13, 2007. Image © 2007 by Angellina Premdehar. Three Unidentified Aerial Lights Over Formation Field On June 14, 2007
